channel.title: Drawing on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Drawing on mattischrome

item.title: Drawing a line on the page
item.description: Ingrid has joined an online drawing class. She sits there on Teams getting feedback on her drawings, while I sit there attempting to absorb everything. I’m also learning by doing, by making a line on the page. In some ways, it’s instructive to observe the difference in what we learn with and without the feedback.
